name: Bicep Curl
description: A classic arm exercise targeting the biceps using dumbbells or barbells.

name: Tricep Dips
description: A bodyweight exercise that strengthens the triceps using parallel bars or a bench.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise for developing upper body strength using a barbell or dumbbells.

name: Squat
description: A fundamental lower-body exercise that strengthens the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Deadlift
description: A full-body compound movement that targets the back, glutes, and hamstrings using a barbell.

name: Pull-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise that builds upper-body strength by engaging the lats, biceps, and shoulders.

name: Overhead Press
description: A strength exercise that targets the shoulders, triceps, and upper chest by pressing weight overhead.

name: Lateral Raise
description: An isolation exercise for building shoulder width by raising dumbbells to the side.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral leg exercise that enhances strength and balance by working the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Crunches
description: A core-strengthening exercise that targets the abdominal muscles to improve stability and definition.
